text: This is a list of American films that are scheduled to be released in 2020. Some films have announced release dates but have yet to begin filming, while others are in production but do not yet have definite release dates. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, numerous notable films that were originally scheduled for release this year were postponed to release in mid through late 2020 and in 2021. == Box office == The highest-grossing American films released in 2020, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows: {| class="wikidiv" |- | style="text-align:left; background:#9fc;"| * | Denotes films still running in cinemas worldwide |} {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto; margin:auto;" |+Highest-grossing films of 2020 |- !
